statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount, purchase_timestamp FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%' ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount, purchase_timestamp FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC, purchase_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) as purchase_count FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY purchase_count DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) as total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id IN (100, 200, 300) GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 200 AND purchase_amount >= 50 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND purchase_timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name HAVING total_spent > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY customer_name, product_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, pr.prediction_score FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id JOIN predictions pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id AND p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id, product_id;
SELECT c.name as customer_name, p.name as product_name, pr.prediction_score FROM predictions pr JOIN customers c ON pr.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;

SELECT customers.name, products.name, purchases.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id;
SELECT customers.name, SUM(purchases.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;

SELECT customers.name, products.name, purchase_history.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = purchase_history.product_id ORDER BY purchase_history.purchase_date DESC;
